Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Prince Park Hotel in Moscow, you'll be connected to a shopping center and close to Orlov Museum of Paleontology and Bitsa Park. This 4-star hotel is within the vicinity of Ochakovo Beer Museum and State Darwin Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 307 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and plasma televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including a sauna and a fitness center.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk and coffee/tea in the lobby. Planning an event in Moscow? This hotel has facilities measuring 19903 square feet (1849 square meters), including conference space. A shuttle from the airport to the hotel is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Prince Park Hotel in Moscow, you'll be connected to a shopping center and close to Orlov Museum of Paleontology and Bitsa Park. This 4-star hotel is within the vicinity of Ochakovo Beer Museum and State Darwin Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Orlov Museum of Paleontology - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Bitsa Park - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
Ochakovo Beer Museum - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
State Darwin Museum - 8.6 km / 5.3 mi
Natalya Sats Musical Theater - 8.8 km / 5.5 mi
Kant Ski Slope - 8.9 km / 5.5 mi
Moscow State University - 9.2 km / 5.7 mi
Sparrow Hills - 10.2 km / 6.3 mi
Tsarytsino Open-Air History and Architectural Museum - 11 km / 6.8 mi
Luzhniki Stadium - 11.1 km / 6.9 mi
Kolomenskoye Historical and Architectural Museum and Reserve - 11.5 km / 7.1 mi
Kolomenskoye Church of the Ascension - 11.5 km / 7.1 mi
Church of the Ascension - 11.5 km / 7.2 mi
Memorial Mosque - 11.7 km / 7.3 mi
Metro Museum - 11.7 km / 7.3 mi

The nearest airports are:
Moscow (VKO-Vnukovo Intl.) - 13.7 km / 8.5 mi
Moscow (SVO-Sheremetyevo) - 38.9 km / 24.2 mi

The preferred airport for Prince Park Hotel is Moscow (SVO-Sheremetyevo).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated.
